Head Blacksmith Ferris:
Now go to the Blasing Swamp, marines kill Orc Footman, snipers Orc Footman, Shaman Orc Footman, Bishop Orc Footman and collect the 12 Crystal Experience. Let the coach sends you. Otherwise, you will not get the Crystal Experience. If the mentor will be there, he will see how much you have progressed in training, and help when needed. His presence is important to you both. Good luck!
